## MemberedTypeToClass.addTypeMember() method

Define a class member for a given type member (constructor, property, method, getter, setter).

**Signature:**

```typescript
addTypeMember(isStatic: boolean, member: TypeMemberImpl): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  isStatic | boolean | true if the class member is static. |
|  member | [TypeMemberImpl](./ts-morph-structures.typememberimpl.md) | the type member to convert to a class member. |

**Returns:**

void
